right-editpassword: Name of the editpassword user right
action-editpassword: Action description of editing other users' passwords and emails
editpassword: Title of the page to edit passwords
editpassword-title: Title of the page to edit passwords and emails
passedit-invalid-email: Error message for invalid email address
passedit-notupdated: Message displayed if there is no change
passedit-info: Usage instruction displayed on the password edit page
passedit-password2: Label of the password confirmation input
passedit-password-nomatch: Error message for passwords that do not match
